inputs.value: You are assisting in creating a training dataset for an image generation lora. Please analyze and caption this image. Create a training prompt for this image - a prompt that would result in this image getting generated. Please be thorough and describe any poses and positions, attire and other physical features. Include a mood description as well. When writing make sure to point out the locations of things in either absolute terms or relative to other items. Return JUST a prompt in natural language text form please.
Use these relevant booru tags for crafting the natural language prompt:

Reply just with a prompt, no titles, explanations or other conversational text. Describe it like a person would. Be direct, don't use overly formal, mechanical or medical speech. Don't use markdown or lists.
